title: Pinpoint AM15 Center Channel Speaker Mount (Satin Black)
description: The Pinpoint Mounts AM15 universal center channel speaker wall mount has been designed for maximum flexibility and compatibility for today's home theater speakers. Sold as a single mount, the AM15 offers full flexibility for mounting center channel speakers up to 30 lbs. and depths from 7-Inch to 11.5-Inch . Simple 2 "L-Inch Bracket design has adjustable arm for providing the correct depth and unlimited width. As most center channel speakers do not come with traditional mounting points, the AM15 is designed to rest the speaker on the arms using the included isolation pads providing a solid and vibration free mounting. All mounting hardware is included. The AM15 is available in black.
